Generation III.Ruby: Luvdisc live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped Pok é mon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean's waves.
Generation III.Sapphire: Luvdisc 's heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and romance. It is said that any couple meeting this Pok é mon is promised a loving relationship that never ends.
Generation III.Emerald: Luvdisc make the branches of Corsola their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a Luvdisc as a gift to express one's feelings of love.
Generation III.FireRed: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
Generation III.LeafGreen: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.

Generation VII.Sun: If a Luvdisc is left on its own, it becomes despondent, leaving itself open to attack. That is when Pelipper snatch them up.

Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space between Corsola's branches.
